title: A Hoale Lot of Trouble
description: Adam Hoale owns a construction company called Hoale Construction. When he finds an eye-opening surprise in the walls of a house heâ€™s flipping, and a libido flaring surprise standing on the lawn, he's willing to do the right thing with the surprise in the wall while entertaining lusty thoughts about the surprise on the lawn.But as the world finds out what he discovered, and his new boy toy seems to be keeping too many secrets to make a relationship a reality, Adam soon realizes he may just get flipped himself if he's not careful.
author: Declan Sands
